name: syntaxhighlighter
description: Easily post syntax-highlighted code to your WordPress site without having to modify the code at all.
author: Alex Mills (Viper007Bond)

scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run archive
scripts.create-dist: mkdir -p dist && mv build/index.js dist/blocks.build.js && mv build/index.css dist/blocks.editor.build.css && mv build/style-index.css dist/blocks.style.build.css
scripts.distclean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -rf build
